text:
<!channel> Hi Everyone! I hope you’ve all had a wonderful long weekend! I’m very thankful for how the first session turned out, big thanks to everyone who participated and helped prepare everything! As Emiko said, this is my brain-baby, but it would never have become reality without you all! :heart:

For anyone who was not able to make it, the recording of the presentation can be found here: <https://youtu.be/762L5vX6X3Q>

I’ve also collected the challenges and resources into this document, so you can check those out, whether you were there or not: <https://osf.io/yf48s/>
